yasassandeepa.summary:
An energetic, highly motivated Tech Enthusiastic. Since writing my first Java program and manipulating it to get the desired result, I have been obsessed with the idea of using software to solve real-world problems. I believe that the power of programming can change and improve the lives of people around the world.

Area of Expertise:

Programming: 
Java, Python, Design Patterns, Coding Conventions and Best Practices, Algorithms, Data Structures, Agile software development, MVC architecture and Microservices

Web Technologies (FrontEnd):
React, React-Redux, React-Hooks, Vue.js, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Material-UI, JavaScript, TypesScript

Web Technologies (BackEnd):
Node.js, Express.js, SpringBoot, REST API, GraphQL, Vert.X (Reactive Programming), Elastic-Search

Database:  
MySQL, MS SQL Server, MongoDB, Firebase

Mobile App Development:
React Native, Flutter

Linux:
Commands, Shell Scripting

Testings:
TDD, Unit testing (JUnit5, Jest), Performance Testing

Cloud:
AWS, Azure, DigitalOcean Spaces, Docker, Kubernetes

Tools: 
GIT Version Controlling (GitHub/Bitbucket)
Maven (Life cycle, Jetty plugins, creating multi-module applications, releasing, deploying..etc)
Package managers - npm and yarn
Postman and Altier for testing REST and GraphQL Endpoints
Wireshark- packet captures
Apache HTTP, Tomcat servers

I wish to continuously enhance my technical and interpersonal skills and strive to give my best at everything I do.

items.title: Document Understanding And Intelligent Question Answering System
items.description:
This is my final year research project. The objective of this research is to introduce a document classification and intelligent question & answering platform to overcome the complex data entry process in large-scale business companies. This is based on Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Natural Language Processing, and image processing techniques.

Used Technologies
Python, Flask             
TensorFlow, Keras, OpenCV
CNN, Graph CNN, R-CNN
YOLO v4, BERT, LayoutLM

items.title: Customer 360
items.description:
Customized User Bound Experience (CUBE) is a business-to-consumer fidelity program management engine designed as an intelligent analytical engine to analyze customer behavior, segmentation, and profiling. It is one of the Enterprise products in hSenid Mobile Solutions.

Customer 360 is a submodule of that massive project. The 360-degree view of customer profile helps identify the customer information, products, and services they are receiving, portfolio information and business potential, etc. 

Used Technologies
 React - Typescript template and latest hooks
 SpringBoot - GraphQL API implementation, Custom queries
 MySQL - Database handling
 Maven - as a build tool

items.title: Easy Claim
items.description:
Easy Claim, the vehicle insurance app provides a platform to make the vehicle insurance claim recovery process more efficient and time-saving from the initial stage of an accident where an agent is directed to the client for assistance, till the very end where the approval of the amount to be claimed is communicated to the client. 

It is a unique application as now there will be no waiting on hold for an agent to be connected or there will be no difficulty in describing your current location wherever you may be. You are just one click away from receiving assistance from an agent, closest to your location at the time of an accident. In addition, with the entirely digitalized system, now the claim recovery process has gone paperless adhering to the green concept.

Technology Stack - Flutter, Firebase

nhewa.summary: I am 4th -year Software Engineering Undergraduate Student At SLIIT.I am incredibly passionate about learning and implementing new technological elements in practical settings. Throughout my academic journey, I have been actively engaging with various aspects of information technology, developing a strong foundation in programming,database management, and software development.One of the things that truly drives me is the opportunity to stay up-to-date with the ever-evolving technology landscape. I am constantly exploring emerging trends, attending webinars, and pursuing online courses to broaden my knowledge and skills. This continuous learning journey not only enhances my technical prowess but also strengthens my ability to adapt and thrive in a fast-paced industry.Beyond the classroom, I have actively sought out practical experiences to apply my knowledge. I have been fortunate to collaborate on several projects, both individual and team-based, which have provided me with invaluable hands-on experience. These projects have honed my problem-solving abilities, fostered teamwork and communication skills, and reinforced the importance of delivering high-quality solutions.I firmly believe in the power of technology to revolutionize industries and improve lives. As I progress in my academic journey, I am keen to explore opportunities where I can contribute my skills and enthusiasm to real-world challenges. I am open to internships, part-time positions, and collaborative projects that allow me to make a meaningful impact and further refine my technical acumen.I am always eager to connect with professionals in the field who share the same passion for technology and innovation. Feel free to reach out if you have any exciting opportunities or would like to connect. Let's collaborate, learn, and make a difference together!

contributors.headline: SE Undergraduate at SLIIT | Full Stack Developer | Associate Software Engineer At Aiken Pvt Ltd

items.title: Online Learning Platform
items.description: The project involves developing a comprehensive online learning platform with a user-friendly web interface, allowing learners to browse, enroll in, and access courses on various devices. It includes a course management service where instructors can manage course content and enrollment details, with roles for instructors to handle course materials and track learner progress, and administrators to approve content, integrate payment gateways, and manage financial transactions. Learners can enroll in multiple courses simultaneously, track their progress, and cancel enrollments if needed. The platform will integrate third-party payment gateways for secure transactions and use external services for sending confirmation and notification emails and SMS upon successful enrollment.

items.title: Online Medicine Availability Checking System(MAD Module)
items.description:
MedTrack is a mobile application that aims to address the ongoing economic crisis in Sri Lanka by helping people find the medicines they need at an affordable price. With the economic situation in the country making, it increasingly difficult for people to access essential medicines, MedTrack provides a platform for customers to search for available medicines in nearby pharmacies. The app also enables suppliers to add their available products to the system. The app also includes a doctor availability checking system, allowing customers to find available doctors nearby. Through these features, MedTrack aims to make medical care more accessible and affordable for people in Sri Lanka during these challenging times. In addition to its core features, MedTrack also includes a request feature that enables customers to request medicines that are not currently available in the app. This feature expands the range of options for customers and helps ensure that they can access the medicines they need, even if they are not currently listed on the app. Additionally, MedTrack provides health tips to users, helping them to stay healthy and recover quickly from any illnesses they may experience during the economic crisis. By providing these additional features, MedTrack aims to support the well-being of people in Sri Lanka and provide them with a comprehensive resource for their medical needs.

Tools :
• Android Studio

Technology :
• Kotline
• Database – Firebase.

items.title: Online Customer Support System(IWT Module)
items.description:
An online customer support system is a software application that enables businesses to provide support to their customers through online channels. The system typically includes a range of features such as chatbots, live chat support, email support, and social media support.The main goal of an online customer support system is to improve customer satisfaction by providing prompt and effective support to customers. By offering support through multiple channels, customers can choose the channel that best suits their needs and preferences.The system also helps businesses to streamline their support process by automating repetitive tasks, such as answering frequently asked questions and routing inquiries to the appropriate support agent. This allows businesses to handle a larger volume of support requests with fewer resources.

Technologies :
•	HTML
•	CSS
•	PHP
•	JavaScript
•	My Sql

With a focus on enhancing operational efficiency, I contributed to cross-functional teams, demonstrating expertise in modern technologies, problem-solving, and collaborative development for impactful software delivery.
